name: Snake Lamia
description: The Snake Lamia features a blend of a humanoid upper body and a large serpent lower body, exuding an aura of malevolence with its striking appearance.
memorable: Combines physical prowess with potent charm and illusion magic, making it a dangerous manipulator in combat.
goals: To manipulate and deceive opponents, utilizing charm and spells to gain control.
relations: Likely encountered with other chaotic evil creatures, and may serve dark powers or entities.
environment: Typically found in dark, secluded areas where it can use its charm spells to lure victims.
strengths: High Charisma enhances deception and spellcasting; proficient in charming and incapacitating foes.
weaknesses: Reliant on magic; vulnerable if opponents resist charm spells or can disrupt its concentration.
attacks: Utilizes a melee spell attack called 'Dizzying Touch' to charm opponents, and 'Constrict' to grapple foes with substantial damage.
most_powerful_ability: Hypnotic Pattern causes widespread incapacitation of enemies, making them unable to act for a minute.
equipment: Wields a dagger, which can deal piercing and poison damage.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 15, indicating keen awareness.
skills: Noteworthy skilled in Deception, able to manipulate others effectively.
additional_information: Can use Misty Step to teleport, enhancing its mobility.
Innate spellcasting allows it to cast spells without material components.
Charmed targets suffer disadvantages on Wisdom saving throws.
Can shapeshift using disguise self, enhancing its deceptive nature.
Radiates a Chaotic Evil aura affecting creatures nearby.
spellcasting: Innately casts charm person, disguise self, and potent spells like geas and hypnotic pattern once per day.
test_queries: large snake creature with charm abilities
cunning creature that uses spells to deceive
dangerous manipulative monster hiding in shadows
chaotic evil creature with grappling attacks
